name: Shrine (huhwhozat)
description:
An entry for Global Game Jam 2016: http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/shrine-3

As a young shrine maiden, you must help your grandmother complete a ritual to appease the restless spirits that threaten the shrine. See README for controls

Credits:

Design, Implementation, Graphics:

Theron Calkins

Brett Campbell

Michael Joy

Jonathan Wideman

Sound:

Andrew Kroepel

Music:

Ben Alexander

Special Thanks To:

Jake Harsch for his boundless ideas and energy.

South Bend GGJ 2016 organizers, hosts, and sponsors for making this event possible.
